channel.title: Comments on: Bitcoin Network Fees: Explained

item.title: By: Mazel CrypTOV

item.description: Very detailed! Short but it has got everything you need to know about Bitcoin network fees. Thanks for sharing this article.
item.content:encoded: Very detailed! Short but it has got everything you need to know about Bitcoin network fees. Thanks for sharing this article.

item.title: By: Anikys3reasure
item.dc:creator: Anikys3reasure
item.description: I never use to understand network fee, I just pay. But I guess this has helped. I will also share to people like me ????. Thanks for sharing.
item.content:encoded:
I never use to understand network fee, I just pay. But I guess this has helped. I will also share to people like me ????.
